// gtag basic snippet code do not change window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []; function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); } gtag('js', new Date()); gtag('config', '{id}', { 'cookie_domain': 'auto', }); document.onreadystatechange = function () { if (document.readyState === 'complete') { // function call to track the new contents post SPA journey trackOutboundLinks(); } } function trackOutboundLinks() { var outbound_links = document.querySelectorAll('.outbound'); // Event Listener to trigger on the click of the outbound link outbound_links[0].addEventListener('click', function (e) { // gtag function call to send event hit to Google Analytics along with the variables gtag('event', 'click', { 'event_category': 'outbound', 'event_label': e.target.href, 'transport_type': 'beacon', }); }); // Event Listener to trigger on the click of the outbound link outbound_links[1].addEventListener('click', function (e) { // gtag function call to send event hit to Google Analytics along with the variables gtag('event', 'click', { 'event_category': 'outbound', 'event_label': e.target.href, 'transport_type': 'beacon', }); }); }
